column4: hey guys, im trying to compile zapping on ubuntu but i get the following error "checking for XML::Parser... configure: error: XML::Parser perl module is required for intltool

2005-12-12T15:39:00.000Z	chris__		what am i dong wrong?
2005-12-12T15:40:00.000Z	nalioth	chris__	if you search for the module name, it'll show you the pkg it's in
